definitions.definition: To impart motion or the appearance of motion to.
definitions.example: If we animate the model, we can see the complexity of the action.

definitions.definition: To give spirit or vigour to; to stimulate or enliven; to inspirit.
Possessing the quality or ability of motion.

definitions.example: She is an engaging and animate speaker.

definitions.definition: (grammar, of a noun or pronoun) Having a referent that includes a human, animal, plant or other entity which is considered alive.
definitions.example: Nouns can be singular or plural, and one of two genders, animate or inanimate.

definitions.definition: (grammar) Inflected to agree with an animate noun or pronoun.
